snippet.title: I Let Twitter Make a Game... (and it's really weird)
snippet.description:
haha yes today we let twitter run the show
➤ DOWNLOAD for android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Dani.MilkmanKarlson
➤ DOWNLOAD for PC - https://danidev.itch.io/milkmankarlson

➤ Evan King's video - https://youtu.be/4-Dv53or4ZU

➤ DANI 2ND channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzmtKpQQyZ-9ZNY_bbFtVHw

➤ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/danidevmilk/
➤ Twitter - https://twitter.com/DaniDevYT
➤ Discord - https://discord.gg/danii
➤ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/danimilkman
➤ Wishlist my game - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1228610/KARLSON/
➤Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/DaniDev/
➤Music by Evan King!!

Tracklist:
0: Evan King - Milkman Karlson theme ()
1: Evan King - Useful (https://youtu.be/w3fJz0yWGo0)
2: Evan King - Neon (https://youtu.be/D5zlXKVfwWI)
3: Evan King - 20XX (https://youtu.be/kZRQosq3PjM)
4: Evan King - Scratch (https://youtu.be/_ehGVFqIZas)
5: Evan King - Thick (https://youtu.be/lBLsoWXtVRY)
6: Evan King - Milkman Karlson theme ()
7: Evan King - Moon Base (https://youtu.be/orooE4jp1ak)

My Speedrun of the game:
Dani2 - Milkman Karlson Speedrun - Spliced World Record (04:13:27)
https://youtu.be/iyoX3uV0UW8

//write longer description here
okay gamers, i asked you on twitter to give me your ideas, and after 24h i took the 5 top rated game ideas / mechanics, and merged it into one single game. it turned out really weird, as you're playing as a vibin karlson, but its kinda fun i guess lol
might do more of this in the future so follow me on twitter slappers

//about
Hey! If you're new here, welcome! I'm an indie game developer, currently working on a physics based game using Unity. This is my devlog / devblog where I show off the progress I make on it. I'll try uploading every week, but I'm pretty busy with university and part time job, so I won't have time every week. But I'll do my best!

PC SPECS:
GTX 1060
i9-9900k
32GB RAM

Laptop / tablet
Surface Pro i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage

My Equipment:
Keyboard - Varmilo VA88M rgb
Mouse - Logitech G305
Mic - AT2020+
Screen - ViewSonic 24" LED Curved VX2458
Headset - Steelseries Arctis 3

If you enjoyed this video, here are some other really good ones I was inspired by:
Jabrils - 🖥️ Making A Game in 48 Hours!
https://youtu.be/SIzY8sR1Ql0
Jabrils - 🖥️ GAME I MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 41!
https://youtu.be/_XHoRAvsJic

Brackeys - MAKING A GAME IN A WEEK!
https://youtu.be/VRpBWBkHvjU
Brackeys - MAKING A GAME IN 10 MINUTES
https://youtu.be/p8MzsDBI5EI
Brackeys - Making of SOUL SURGE - Ludum Dare 44
https://youtu.be/zYeydD5SpTQ

BlackThornProd - I MADE A GAME IN 1 WEEK WITH UNITY
https://youtu.be/GTFYmzYjHzg
BlackThronProd - LUDUM DARE 42 - Making of EVOLUTION
https://youtu.be/36TWQR4FV8w

Iain Anderson - 48 Hour Game Making Challenge 2012
https://youtu.be/gSKGrVh2TpE

Dani (This guy kinda sucks, but it's an alright video i guess)
Dani - I Made a Game in 48 Hours!
https://youtu.be/gzPGmR6R67Y

#Dani #unity #gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #unity3d #madewithunity #indiedev #unity2d
